Cheats.GamemodeUnlockedWorldsDesc: Allows Journey characters to join non-Journey worlds and vice-versa.
Cheats.GodModeDesc: Prevents your player from taking damage, suffering from the effects of debuffs, etc.
Cheats.JourneyModeDesc: Gives non-Journey characters access to Journey-specific features (i.e. research).
Cheats.MapTeleportDesc: Allows you to right-click anywhere on a map to teleport.
